snippet: Swansea City manager Bob Bradley has asked his players to banish fear from their hearts as they prepare for the visit of Manchester United in the Premier League on Sunday....

headline.main: Bradley Urges Swansea to Play Without Fear Against Man United
headline.print_headline: Bradley Urges Swansea to Play Without Fear Against Man United

lead_paragraph: Swansea City manager Bob Bradley has asked his players to banish fear from their hearts as they prepare for the visit of Manchester United in the Premier League on Sunday.

snippet: Everton will fight to restore their crumbling reputation with a strong finish to a poor campaign that has left them languishing in mid-table, says captain Phil Jagielka....

headline.main: Everton Must Restore Pride in Last Three Games-Jagielka
headline.print_headline: Everton Must Restore Pride in Last Three Games-Jagielka

lead_paragraph: Everton will fight to restore their crumbling reputation with a strong finish to a poor campaign that has left them languishing in mid-table, says captain Phil Jagielka.

snippet: The results of scans on Harry Kane's injured ankle were better than expected but there is no time frame on the Tottenham Hotspur striker's return to action, manager Mauricio Pochettino said....
lead_paragraph: The results of scans on Harry Kane's injured ankle were better than expected but there is no time frame on the Tottenham Hotspur striker's return to action, manager Mauricio Pochettino said.

snippet: Stoke City winger Xherdan Shaqiri is likely to sit out Sunday's Premier League encounter against table-toppers Arsenal with a hamstring injury, manager Mark Hughes said....

headline.main: Shaqiri Ruled Out of Arsenal Clash With Hamstring Injury
headline.print_headline: Shaqiri Ruled Out of Arsenal Clash With Hamstring Injury

lead_paragraph: Stoke City winger Xherdan Shaqiri is likely to sit out Sunday's Premier League encounter against table-toppers Arsenal with a hamstring injury, manager Mark Hughes said.

snippet: Premier League strugglers Sunderland have signed defender Jan Kirchhoff from Bayern Munich for an undisclosed fee, the club said on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Premier League strugglers Sunderland have signed defender Jan Kirchhoff from Bayern Munich for an undisclosed fee, the club said on Thursday.

snippet: Everton's Gareth Barry says the arrival of new coach Ronald Koeman is keeping him motivated ahead of his 20th season in the Premier League....

headline.main: Record Holder Barry Inspired by Koeman Challenge
headline.print_headline: Record Holder Barry Inspired by Koeman Challenge

lead_paragraph: Everton's Gareth Barry says the arrival of new coach Ronald Koeman is keeping him motivated ahead of his 20th season in the Premier League.

snippet: Newcastle United winger Andros Townsend said he does not regret swapping a chance to win the Premier League title with Tottenham Hotspur for a relegation battle....

headline.main: Townsend Not Missing Spurs Title Challenge
headline.print_headline: Townsend Not Missing Spurs Title Challenge

lead_paragraph: Newcastle United winger Andros Townsend said he does not regret swapping a chance to win the Premier League title with Tottenham Hotspur for a relegation battle.

snippet: Arsenal's bid to win the FA Cup for a third successive year ended on Sunday when they lost 2-1 at home to Watford in a pulsating quarter-final tie....

headline.main: Watford Dump Holders Arsenal Out of FA Cup
headline.print_headline: Watford Dump Holders Arsenal Out of FA Cup

lead_paragraph: Arsenal's bid to win the FA Cup for a third successive year ended on Sunday when they lost 2-1 at home to Watford in a pulsating quarter-final tie.

snippet: Gareth Barry's performance in Everton's Capital One (League) Cup semi-final win against Manchester City on Wednesday night has led manager Roberto Martinez to describe the midfielder as "one of the best English players ever"....

headline.main: Barry One of England's Best Ever, Says Martinez
headline.print_headline: Barry One of England's Best Ever, Says Martinez

lead_paragraph: Gareth Barry's performance in Everton's Capital One (League) Cup semi-final win against Manchester City on Wednesday night has led manager Roberto Martinez to describe the midfielder as "one of the best English players ever".

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur could not have been in a worse situation before Sunday's north London derby against Arsenal but captain Hugo Lloris believes it also gives the side the ideal chance to win back fans and gain some momentum....

headline.main: Arsenal Derby Chance for Spurs to Make Fans Proud-Lloris
headline.print_headline: Arsenal Derby Chance for Spurs to Make Fans Proud-Lloris

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur could not have been in a worse situation before Sunday's north London derby against Arsenal but captain Hugo Lloris believes it also gives the side the ideal chance to win back fans and gain some momentum.
